name: Aqua Affinity
description: Increases underwater mining speed

name: Bane of Arthropods
description: Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs (spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, endermites and bees).

name: Blast Protection
description: Reduces explosion damage and knockback.

name: Channeling
description: Trident 'channels' a bolt of lightning toward a hit entity. Functions only during thunderstorms and if target is unobstructed with opaque blocks.

name: Curse of Binding
description: Items cannot be removed from armor slots, except in Creative mode or due to death or breaking.

name: Curse of Vanishing
description: Item destroyed on death.

name: Depth Strider
description: Increases underwater movement speed.

name: Efficiency
description: Increases tool speed. When applied to an Axe it increases the chance that the axe may stun a shield, with the base chance being 25% and a 5% increase for each level of efficiency.

name: Feather Falling
description: Reduces fall damage.

name: Fire Aspect
description: Sets target on fire.

name: Fire Protection
description: Reduces fire damage and burn time. Mutually exclusive with other protections.

name: Flame
description: Arrows set the target on fire, and ignite TNT if hit.

name: Fortune
description: Increases certain block drops. Higher levels increase chances.

name: Frost Walker
description: Turns water beneath the player into frosted ice and prevents the damage the player would take from standing on magma blocks and campfires.

name: Impaling
description: Trident deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean. In Bedrock Edition, having impaling on a trident also deals extra damage to players or mobs in water or rain.

name: Infinity
description: Shooting consumes no regular arrows. Does not include Tipped Arrows or Spectral Arrows.

name: Knockback
description: Increases knockback.

name: Looting
description: Increases mob loot. Higher levels increase loot dropped.

name: Loyalty
description: Trident returns after being thrown. Higher levels reduce return time.

name: Luck of the Sea
description: Increases rate of good loot (enchanting books, etc.). Higher Levels Increase chance.

name: Lure
description: Decreases wait time until fish/junk/loot 'bites'. Higher Levels decrease wait time.

name: Mending
description: XP orbs gained are used to repair the item instead of adding experience to bar.

name: Multishot
description: Shoot 3 arrows in a spread at the cost of one; only one arrow can be recovered.

name: Piercing
description: Arrows pass through multiple entities and Shields; arrows can be recovered after passing through entities. *Available only to the crossbow.

name: Power
description: Increases arrow damage.

name: Projectile Protection
description: Reduces projectile damage such as damage from arrows, thrown tridents, ghast and blaze fireballs, etc.

name: Protection
description: Reduces most types of damage by 4%‌[JE only] (or 5%‌[BE only] ) for each level.

name: Punch
description: Increases arrow knockback.

name: Quick Charge
description: Decreases crossbow charging time.

name: Respiration
description: Extends underwater breathing time. Stacks with a Turtle Shell

name: Riptide
description: Trident launches player with itself when thrown. Functions only in water or rain.

name: Sharpness
description: Increases damage for melee weapons.

name: Silk Touch
description: Mined blocks drop themselves, with a few exceptions.

name: Smite
description: Increases damage to undead mobs.

name: Soul Speed
description: Increases walking speed on Soul Sand or Soul Soil, but damages the Boots over time

name: Sweeping Edge
description: Increases sweeping attack damage.

name: Thorns
description: Reflects some of the damage taken when hit, at the cost of reducing durability with each proc.

name: Unbreaking
description: Reduces the chance of an item taking damage. Higher levels reduce the chance further.
